Class ReactDefaults

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.react.ReactDefaults

  • public class ReactDefaults
extends Object
    Physics engine constants

      static class  ReactDefaults.ContactsPositionCorrectionTechnique
      Position correction technique used in the contact solver (for contacts).
      static class  ReactDefaults.JointsPositionCorrectionTechnique
      Position correction technique used in the constraint solver (for joints).

      Default restitution coefficient for a rigid body.

      A body with angular velocity smaller than the sleep angular velocity (in rad/s) might enter sleeping mode.

      A body with a linear velocity smaller than the sleep linear velocity (in m/s) might enter sleeping mode.

      Time (in seconds) that a body must stay still to be considered sleeping.

      The machine epsilon.

      Object margin for collision detection in meters (for the GJK-EPA Algorithm).

      Distance threshold for two contact points for a valid persistent contact.

      2 * Pi constant.

      static boolean SLEEPING_ENABLED
      True if the sleeping technique is enabled.
